content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were driving through blackshear at aprox. 10 p.M. last night and saw two bright flashes similar in brightness to lightening. we then saw a light green ovaloid object with orange flames from the back of it moving through the sky west to east and making no sound. it seemed to be losing altitude but was not moving at an extreme rate of speed like a meteor. it was only visible for 3 to 5 seconds before being obscured by the tree line. once on hwy 84 driving toward waycross, we caught sight of an extremely bright orangish light in the eastern sky in the same approximate area of the previous burning object. it floated in the sky moving slighty from side to side before fading from view after a few minutes.
content.summary: Light green oval shape with orange flame behind resembling the burn of an alcohol lamp

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:30/10:40pm on saturday 30th april 2011, i witnessed 2 formations of lights that moved in a westerly formation, within the middle of the city of norwich, united kingdom.

as i was walking along king st heading in the direction of the waterfront (a club next to the river wensum) with friends, heading in a south-westerly direction, i looked up and saw 9 lights heading west at rapid speed in 2 separate groups. the night sky was hazey, and it was hard to make out even the brightest stars, such as venus or polaris. there was 2 distinct formations, one consisting of 3 lights, and a larger group, which had five but was joined by a sixth, that was further north than the smaller group and was of similar appearence in colour, both of which headed in a westerly direction, out towards the north sea, over the norfolk broads. the light that joined the larger group, performed a sharp right turn, about 30 degrees turn, to formate with the larger group. all the lights appeared whiteish amber in appearence. due to distance, i was unable to tell what the lights were.

the smaller group, which appeared more southerly out of the 2, appeared in a v formation, with one lead light leading, and the other 2 behind and to the left and right, similar to a vic formation used by pilots. the larger, more northerly group, originally had 5 lights, in a pyramid-looking formation, with a lead light, then 2 behind on the left and right, and then 2 behind them with one on the outher left and another to the right of that but in the middle. a sixth light headed towards this group and turned sharply in an un-natural fashion to take a place in the back of the group, on the right hand point of the pyramid. as norfolk is over-flown by both us air force and royal airforce fighter jets, the turn performed by light to join with the formation was aggressive, and a distinct change of direction as opposed to a gradual turn that would be made by military jets (i have witnessed eurofighter typhoon and boeing f-15 eagle fighter planes perform dact (disimilar air combet maneuvering) in the skys in both day and night). the 2 formations headed in a westerly direction, over the broads and out to the north sea. the event lasted for about 15 seconds as the lights deminished rapidly. when i alerted my friends to what i witnessed, no one had looked up and spotted the lights. and as i tried to direct their view to where i has seen the lights, no one was able to see any lights

as an aviation enthusiast (or plane spotter to put it in laymans terms), i can tell between military ,commercial, and civilian aircraft at day and night. on a saturday, it is very rare to have military jets flying, let alone at night and over a major uk city. flying operations out of norwich airport would have stopped by that time of night and although comercial airliners fly over norfolk, none would fly in formation, let alone join up with a group of planes at night. although i have no way of knowing what these lights belonged to, whether they be fighter jets, airliners, privately owned planes, or something not of this earth like a meteor os space debris re-entering the atmosphere, i do know that these lights are unidentifiable and beyond my knowledge of aviation. 

i can only hope that my sighting may have been witnessed by others in the norfolk area. thank you for your time and patience with my sighting.
content.summary: 2 groups of lighs moving west, one of which joined and formated with larger group

content.detailedDescription:
I was parked  in a parking taking  my  lunch  break   from work in a   parking lot over looking  the  livermore pleasanton valley and  over looking   an  airport.The  object was  about 15  miles away  but  was a  clear day and no  flying  objects  seen  in that  area.Ive never  seen  a  ufo in my life,, and   that was not   an  airplane   because ut  was   flying  below   the hillsides and not a helicopter  because it was  as  silver that it  can be seen for   miles  then  it like disapeard  before my  eyes  for  a second then came  back.The flight  path  as i looked  it up  in local  maps follows a  nuclear ge plant that had a   radiation  leakage  about   in the  70ties.I lost  sight of the object  as it wentbehind  a  hill , and   never cam out  of the  at the other end of it.


i saw silver  object  looking like a bell  shape flying east  to west about 2-3 miles  per  hour  about 20  feet  off the   ground  between  hills south  of  livermore calif and flying  towards a ge nuclear site.It was   dusk and  it   at times appeared  to  disappear and  reappear.When  looking  for it  when it flew  to  the other  side the  hill ,, it did not  come out.No pictures  were  taken   but  it  looks like   pictures  taken  but  others    in which  an  object is  flying between   hills.
content.summary: Silver  in  color, size  about 6ft  hight  bell shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cig after walking the dog around the block and something caught my eye as a flash over the roof and looked up and saw a large fireball or large meteor the largest i've ever seen moving very slowly very very bright white a hundred times brighter than sirius and break up into many fragments and disappear dead overhead. wondering if anyone saw a better view.
content.summary: Large fireball breaks up dead overhead from east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the weather channel on the evening of all the tornadoes.  they featured one live that they said at least a mile wide.  there were sky scrapers in the foreground.  after tornado had dissipated i could see an  oblong circle on the right side of the picture.  it was just in the cloud formation but very visible and stationary.  i did not capture an image.  i couldn't believe no one noticed or said something about it.  coverage then changed.  i thought i'd find some discussion about it in some forums i participate in.  i have not seen anything to date but there it was and it appeared to be big as in 200 ft diameter or so.  hopefully they saved the footage of this historic monster tornado.
*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Oblong circular (side) ufo on weather channel after major tornado

content.detailedDescription: Vimos un objeto volador el cual pens���bamos que era un avi���n pero por la velocidad no lo parec���a, y no tenia luces intermitentes, tenia colores, como rojo, azul y amarillo, es poca informaci���n pero es lo que tengo.
content.summary: Ovni con colores, se movia rapido, y se dirigia hacia el sur

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and in the sky ahead i saw a round, white object moving at a fairly good clip across the sky from west to east.  i tried to grab my camera but it was already gone by the time i got it out of my purse.  i saw a passenger jet pass by about a minute later, and the object was at the same altitude as the jet which had just taken off from a nearby airport.  the object's diameter was the same length as that of the passenger jet.  there is no chance of this being a jet, however, as it was perfectly round.  it also moved quite fast across the sky.  i remember thinking to myself "they're back'.  i had had an experience in october of last year.  i wasn't alarmed or scared - it just seemed like it was back and that it was perfectly normal for it to be in the sky near my house.
content.summary: Round object moved across sky west to east, large as a passenger jet

content.detailedDescription: I actually had several experiences. at any given nite i could sit out and spot them. my brother sister in law and daughter also witnessed these. one flew rite over me and my daughter ran inside. 6mos later i moved bak to stlouis and had a hysterectomy. my doc seemed to b guessing at what was on my ovary when he removed it. im not sure about that part. he just looked funnx at me when talking about it. it was an experience that made me a believer. i was surprised that most people there saw things and it was no big deal. like in a movie r something. what i noticed was they appear to be stars but its the reflection to their metallic look that causes this. they hoover at tree level too. pilot knob is where i first saw them. one spiralled 2wards the lake. they seem attracted to bodies of water. that nite they were attracted to the mud island we were standing on and coleman lantern we had lit. this is wat i felt that nite. i hid in my brothers truck. that wasnt all that summer either.
content.summary: Surrounded us while night fishing hiding at tree level

content.detailedDescription: At 1:36am 30 april 2011 my brother and i walked out on the back porch of our house to smoke a cigarette, when lighting my cigarette i noticed that the birds were not chirping and there was no noise at all, when i turned my head to the right i noticed a sudden change in color on the ground and trees, immediately after seeing this i see movement in my peripheral vision and looked up and saw a aircraft in the sky moving northeast moving over the corner of the house. the air craft is very hard to describe in words, it had 5 circular lights that emitted the orange reddish glow that was in a v shaped pattern but the craft itself was not exactly v shaped. it had a long body that seemed to narrow at the front and expand to the rear and it was a blackish metal that had a slight shine to it . the way it moved it was gliding at a slow pace than slowed a bit more to a near stop than started moving in at a angle but the lights or craft did not turn at all and continued moving. upon seeing it i thought i was seeing things and pulled my brother out from away the house for him to see it. when we both acknowledged it, it was close to being over head by then, i felt i sudden fear ive never felt in my life come upon me and forced myself into the house. coming in we woke our father up and took him outside but by that time it was gone, minutes after the birds started chirping again. afterwords we both felt very tired and shocked, it was very hard to sleep after that for me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Standing on back porch and a aircraft came over heading northeast

content.detailedDescription:
I was snowboarding at bittersweet in otsego, mi and at the top of the hill i noticed that there were two large lights in the distance. i sat and watched them for a moment, and as i watched i noticed two other glowing lights a bit away, either smaller or further away. i sat for about a half hour and then watched as they both faded in and out periodically. not in any sort of pattern, but randomly. 
   i've seen ufo's numerous times before and it's something i have a lot of interest in, so i wasn't afraid. just curious. 
    i watched the trees bordering the horizon to see if it was a stationary object then and neither set of lights were. the bigger two appeared to drift lazily and slowly upward and to the left. the smaller ones then disappeared and after the bigger ones had faded out for some time i decided to go down the hill. after going down the hill a few times i noticed that the larger set of lights were back. the smaller were still nowhere to be seen. i went back up the hill and sat down again, this time calling a few friends over to ask if they seen it too. they said they did and sat and watched with me. 
   within 10 minutes of us sitting there that time we all yelled out as the smaller set suddenly reappeared and shot out a very fast blinking light towards to other. the fast, and rapidly blinking light went past the other set of lights, circled back around very quickly and then disappeared very suddenly. 
both sets of lights disappeared after that and did not reappear while i was there.

  two weeks later i was back snowboarding again and again, i seen two bright lights in the distance in the same general direction but more to the right than they were before. they again faded periodically and drifted about lazily. again, my friends witnessed the same thing. this time it reappeared and disappeared over and over whilst we were there. eventually we grew tired of it and as we had no way to record it and no explanation we started snowboarding again. i kept an eye on the area throughout the night and it just kept repeating the same behavior while reappearing in different areas. 

  my sister, the next week showed me a video she had recorded of a very similar object. the video isn't great, but it's pretty much the same thing i saw, but not as bright or as close. i believe she's already reported it here, somewhere.

  i have not seen any more strange lights when i've gone back there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 sets of two lights that shot out a fast blinking light that quickly faded.

content.detailedDescription:
26/04/2011 just after dark i went out for my routine cigarette and as a ufo enthesiest take the opportunity to look to the stars. mulling on the daily problems initialy i didnt look up but when i did i noticed 2 x star like objects but looked to be seperated by a very small margin, probably less than half the size of the object seperated them, they were extremely close together. when i first noticed the objects i tried several times to refocus my eyes because i thought it was an illusion of the light at distance, my sight is very good so i am left certain that there were two objects or it was 1 object somehow joined as it maintained the seperation for the duration and seemed to be moving as one.
i am in the eastern suburbs of melbourne and when i looked up the object was almost directly above but slightly to the east. 
the object/s were moving apx from south to north direction and was visible to me for apx 10 secs as it was fading as it moved away. it covered a significant distance and was moving quickly for the distance it was at.
the object/s were a burnt orange colour, they were solid in intensity, no chemtrail or aura.
it was a considerable distance and hard to estimate though it did look to be in our atmosphere and mabee moving out of it as it faded away.
content.summary: Dual star like object

content.detailedDescription:
myself and my girlfriend were walking around in the evening finishing some errands around 9:30 pm in the lower haight neighborhood. we both looked up and saw a boomarang object that was almost as black as the sky, moving north fairly quickly. it looked like a b-2 stealth bomber. it didn't make a sound, it was like watching a glider. it was gone fairly quickly. it was a fantastic sight. this sighting took place at the intersection of scott and page in san francisco. we noticed the object because it was moving and that caught our attention. it was also a slightly different darkness then the sky. i could not tell how far up it was, but i was under the impression that it was large. bigger then a b-2.
 we both had the impression that it wasn't a plane because it was totally silent. it moved in a straight line north until we lost sight of it due to houses and street lights.
  we both felt very excited and lucky to have seen something so cool.
content.summary: Boomarang object moving north very quickly

content.detailedDescription: Cone shape fell from sky at an angle nose of cone down. elliptical ring of orange flames coming from backside arranged neatly all the same length like a ring of bunsen burners or the flames on a gas stove. the bright white light at the nose remained while the flames shut off at the same time and started back one to two seconds later. was traveling south west on 204 in savannah, georgia in front of atlantic armstrong state university. traveling at a very fast rate. object was large, it just appeared. news said it was probably space debris. i will never believe that unless i see it. object went behind trees and out of sight.
content.summary: Cone shape bright white with orange fire from rear that were neat flames like a bunsen burner. flames shut of then on

content.detailedDescription: While returning home from oxford, oh to liberty, in on bath rd. in franklin cty., in, i was looking off to the right towards liberty. i had been watching contrails from aircraft in a clear blue sky, which we had not seen in nearly a month. the terrain is farmland with a few copses of trees and one can see the cell tower in liberty, on us 27. while looking out towards that area, suddenly there were several teardrop flashes just above the trees in a straightline trajectory moving from west to east, towards oxford. there were approximately five of them and to describe it, they moved so fast it was almost incomprehensible. just as i remarked to my husband, they were gone. it was not the cell tower, but looked like the strobes at an airport. there is an airport belonging to miami university, however, it was to the left and about 5 miles behind us. further, they do not have those type of strobes. these were silver blue teardrop shapes. really hard to describe, though. no, i did not think it a tower. i am on that road virtually everyday and know every nook and cranny of it. it looked like the strobes on a runway and very much like an led light. to describe what i felt? freaked out. gave me a creepy feeling. it or they, seemed to have just disappeared behind us into the sky. it was still light out, too.
content.summary: Low flying flashes

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my patio star-gazing as usual, and in the distance i can see planes coming into san jose mineta airport. as i watched the planes coming in, i noticed that behind them in the distance i could see this brilliantly bright light appear out of no where. it was about the size of 1/2 a pencil eraser and appeared to be hovering over the east side (alum rock area). for about 5 minutes, it just hovered, then it slowly started drifting south. then, all of a sudden, two more showed up and their lights appeared out of no where! (kinda like if you were standing in a dark room, and someone turned on a flashlight facing you.) these two didn't hover though. they automatically started moving towards the south following the first one. out of these three, the first one was super bright. the other two were bright, but not as much. i watched them slowly disappear as they moved towards coyote valley and morgan hill. when they were almost completely out of sight, a fourth one appeared from the same spot the other three came from. only, this one started moving slowly towards the north as if it was going up towards fremont. there is no way these were airplanes, or helicopters. they were too bright, had solid white light illuminating with no flashing lights (as per faa regulations), and from my point anyway, there was no sound. these were exactly what i saw about a month or so ago over the cupertino quarry. i wanted to look at them with my telescope, but it is broken and is going to be repaired tomorrow. ever since my experience in dec 2010, i have been calling them my "friends", and have hoped to get another good look someday. maybe my chance is coming back soon!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 objects flying south towards morgan hill

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the grocery store, approximately august 26, 2006 at around 8:37pm, in irvine on culver near the freeway. i lit up a cigarette while i was standing on the driveway of the house i was living at. i turned to look at the garage and saw a black metal disc with circular lights on its underside about 5 meters across hovering over it. it hovered forward and backward over the roof then it was gone. it was about 5 meters from where i was standing. i ran into the backyard, which was how i had access to my room, and was trying to locate it but it was gone. i was shocked and felt special because i love the ufo mystery and i actually saw a solid one. the story does not end there...

that night, we usually kept the sliding glass door open with the screen shut, i was abducted by six beings who looked like black shadows. i remember the moment when they had me half-way out of the sliding door. i told them, as they were carrying me horizontally, "i don't want to go, i don't want to go!". at that moment i saw a fantastic light show outside. it looked like a larger ship. what they did next was they applied pressure with some sort of tool on the top rear of my head. i felt a "peircing" pain and i was out, i fell asleep, only to wake up the next morning, which felt like no time had gone by at all.

i want to find out what happened that night. i always thought after that moment that i was special to them and they gave me a gift.
content.summary: 5 meters across, black metal disc, red circular lights on its underside

content.detailedDescription:
1. at home. helping my wife remove the kids & stuff from car after we got home from visiting (eastern suburbs of melbourne, australia)

2. there were 3 actually. we noticed them because they were brighter than the stars & were flickering red/green/yellow

3. a star at first. but then used my slr with 300mm lens to take a closer look

4. one object started in the south-east moved westerly then headed south till it could no longer be seen. the other main object remained in sigth over melbourne's south for over an hour till cloud set in. once the cloud sleared the object could no longer be seen. the third was over melbourn'es north. this was further than the other 2.

all 3 had the same characteristics. orb-like in shape & changing in color from red to green to yellow & through the whole colour spectrum. only one seemed to move from south east to west then to east. the others were somewhat static. i did however capture one of them move between 2 fames on the still camera.

5. excited. i'm a ufo enthusiast & actually spotted one of these 2 nights before. the one 2 nights before was much closer however i didn't have my tripod so the night shots showed a staggering coloured object rather than the white object shown when the camera was still.

6. i lost sight of the first one when it went so far south that i couldn't see it. i lost view of the other 2 when cloud cover set in. the objects were not visible once the clouds moved on.

i have pics of both events & video footage of 29/april/2011. the video attached is a small sample. i have 10mins in total.
content.summary: Spotted a round object flashing through all colours of spectrum heading west

content.detailedDescription: I went out the back door that faces the western sky it was dark and cloudy.  there is nothing west of us but miles and miles of fields and various farm land. i right away seen a fireball bright orangish red rising from the ground. it looked to be about 2-3 miles away. it hovered for a minute or two not getting up to high and it started moving to the northwest. this thing dwarfed any other lights in comparison even from the distance between us and the object. it was huge! i grabbed my camera and car keys and tried to chase it down to no avail.  it starting moving way to fast. i was speeding and trying to catch it jumping from one road to another. i just wanted to get it documented. maybe next time. we have seen it in the same spot a few times in the past year.  there were four of us that witnessed it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Arising from the ground about 2-3 miles away a huge fireball climbed in the sky and headed northwest

content.detailedDescription:
I was out jogging threw my neighborhood at about 10:05 on 4/29/2011 here in jax fl u.S.A. i was jogging toward the north when in the corner of my eye i saw a green flash in the sky , i stopped to watch as my first instinct was that it might be a passenger jet with a serious problem. for about 5 seconds i watched a green fireball fall down to the earth ,this was toward the west. the event only lasted about 5 seconds before it disappeared in a bright flash.

after seeing the first event i then turned around now heading south in a hurry to get my family outside in case there was more to see. i then noticed a pastel colored object that resembled a symmetrical gathering of light bubbles. i then watched this for about 15 seconds before it disappeared.

a few things to note , we get a lot of air traffic here where i live and i am very use to seeing aircraft of all types as i go walking at night often. this includes shooting stars as well.

also early on about 2 minutes or so before i viewed the fireball i noticed a group of lights which resembled a plan heading south that performed a sharp u-turn to the north/west. it seemed to sharp a turn for your average passenger plane.
content.summary: green fire ball falling toward the west followed by a pastel colored bubble ship appearing toward the south.

content.detailedDescription:
approximately within the time frame of 9:00 p.M. to 9:20 p.M. eastern standard time, usa, the night sky's as scene from plant city, florida, where very active with fast and slow traveling circular lights moving erratically about the western sky's.  up to 4 of these ufo's or the same one, was scene a few minutes apart fading in and out, from the sighting of the last one, and moving various directions.  there or it's elevation was guessed to be just inside the earths atmosphere between were jet planes fly and satellites orbit.  there where no fire trails.  

  also at 9:15 pm from the same view point, looking straight up in the sky from my location, was scene some type of explosion in space.  the circular flash like explosion was bright white and from start to fade away lasted three seconds.  guesses were made that it may have been a ufo or a distant sun going super nova, but it was ruled out that it was a meteor due to no fire trail and obvious difference.  the size of the explosion in a comparison from the view point, would have been similar to a quarter the size of the moon. 

  a science fiction writer could guess that there was some type of space battle going on.  i personally being a studier of all subjects for over 35 years and being level headed, well i could probably say with almost certainty the same thing.
content.summary: Florida skys very active with ufo active in the west & directly above

content.detailedDescription: I left my home on old bee caves rd. at around 11:35-11:40 a.M. heading southeast on old bee caves when just after a mile from my home i looked up to the sky and saw a very bright white light. i was the only car on the two lane road and continued to look while driving, trying to figure out what it could possibly be because it didn't have any red lights or any other like the kind i always see on airplanes that fly over my apartments to bergstrom airport. i could not see any body of a plane or helicopter. it looked incredibly like a bright star that was closer than any star has ever been just above me in broard daylight. it shoned so bright that it looked like there were light beams reflecting off it to make it look star shaped. it started to ascend in a vertical incline straight up to the sky, and then just a few seconds later simply disappered in the sky. there were no clouds nearby or any airplanes or helicopters. shortley thereafter i see a southwest airplane but only see the normal lights on a plane and can see the whole body of the plane, so i know it couldn't have been a plane. then a while later as i was on ih35 heading to san marcos i spot two helicopters flying in the same general vicinity that i believe the star was at when i had spotted early on old bee caves rd. then i called my boyfriend who likes to follow ufo sightings to ask him if he thought i might of saw one because he knows more about these things, and he seems to think that was exactly what it was. upon getting to school and telling some friends they believed it might have been something as well, and everyone thought i should report this little bit of information to you. i also feel that i did see something very unique and important, and feel privileged to have this sighting whatever it may be.
content.summary: I saw a large bright star out the front windshield of my car up above that ascended at an incline then disappeared in a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Ok well this is wat i took  maybe like 30 to 45 mins later after  i saw the shiny star like object ....... it looks like a flock of seagulls an they are rilly rilly high up weir i saw the object..  an it looks like their circleing around a dark cigar shape.. it could be a seagulle but it dosent look like the seagulls around it .. idk check it out!!!

the other pic weir the pol is at well to the right of it u need to zoom in an u can see the seagulls an thats weir i saw the shiny star like object...
content.summary: I was looking out the window

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on my front porch looking up at the clear sky and admiring the stars. i then saw something that seemed out of place. it was a small red dot in the sky. at first glance i thought it must be a plane but as i watched it i knew that it couldn't be. i have seen many planes and many different types of planes in our open air space skies. the path it was taking was very odd and it was moving across the sky at a very high speed. it started from what i believe was the north and moved at an angle up towards the south fallowing pa rout 61. as it moved across the sky it was getting smaller and smaller. it almost seemed to speed up and then it became very smaller the the stars in the sky and just disapeared. this is not the first time i saw this strange red light in the sky. back in july of last year me and my husband were sitting on our back porch and it was still daylight when we saw what only can be described as a fire ball in the sky. the strange thing about these two sightings were that not only were the same color and shape but the were both seemed to be movinf north to south on pa route 61. both times i witnessed this i was left with a strange feeling. i felt like i saw something out of the ordianry and my heart started beating fast and i got the opposite of a chilled feeling i almost felt like i got hot. i know that is strange to say but that is how i felt after both sightings.
content.summary: It looked like a small red dot in the sky at first i thought it might be a plane but i then realized it wasn't.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the couch talking to my husband and we could see from the corner of our eyes a large bright light green light at that and we turned and watched it shoot downward across the sky and behind the trees and it was huge and green lime green big and so bright and moving fast and i am glad we got to see it so good we prayed and was glad we saw it from an open window. we thought it was a metoer.
content.summary: We saw a bright light ball shape fly downward in the sky  and it was green a big green lime green ball of light at around 3 am  just shoot downward thro the sky behind the trees

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished work and was talking with a co-worker outside when i first noticed a string of orange lights emerge from the clouds to the north. the lights maintained a north/south flight direction but changed their orientation and shape several times. several of the lights traded places with each other before forming a chevron shape and passing over head. the lights maintained a constant speed and were only visible for 30 to 45 seconds due to cloud cover. the only time the objects appeared to change altitude was when the lights traded position with one another. my first inclination was that they were perhaps seagulls reflecting street light, but the chevron shape they formed flew the wrong direction for a flock of birds with the two points of the chevron as the leading flight edge. it was fairly quiet at the time and there was no noise to report. the lights did not strobe, and appeared to maintain the same brilliance, with no one light more brilliant then the next.
content.summary: 6-8 orange lights in a line

content.detailedDescription: I was by the junk yard by nelles a.F.B las vegas n.V on 4-28.2011 the time was about 216  pm there were 2 f16 plane passed by n wright on top of the air plane there it was a u.F.O it pass the f16 like there were even there the u.F.O turn on a dine to the right  goin east it was gon but this is not the first time i was on my way to italy in 1993 i look out the window n there it was a u.F.O i ask the girl next to me what in the hell is that she look everyone was looking the flight atendent ask me to clost the shade i said no she came back n look at my seat no. everyone was talking about it in the plane 2 hour later wen wee got to italy all over the paper u.F.O over italy i said i know what i saw thank you this is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: U.F.O north town las vegas

content.detailedDescription: Here are some more great & strange pictures i cant explain... there not planes or helicopters thats for sure...Please mufon investigate this area, i see these images every nite...
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: More proof of ufos over nyc & brooklyn

content.detailedDescription: I catch orbs strange lights and many actual alien air craft i believe on these wired ny web cams all the time... i wish mufon would do an investigation at night on one of these roof tops... i would guess they would getalot of great pictures/video... i see them every night... what are they waiting for???
content.summary: What are these ufos doing over brooklyn?

content.detailedDescription: I`m just wondering if anybody saw it and i`m not nuts if so please email me if anyone else saw anything if no one else did my apologies i guess thank you much .
content.summary: Silent it was there

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside noticed two metallic objects in the sky. one of the objects accelerated quickly crossing a valley between to mountains distance of at least 20 miles in about 1 second the other object moved slowly and hovered for a few minutes. the other object slowly started moving west until its view was obstructed by mountains. if i had to guess the altitude of the object i would have to say was about 15,000 to 20,000 ft. i was able to get a photo and video of the slower moving object seeing as it took a five minutes to cross the valley in which we were located. my internet connection is too slow to support the upload of the video seeing as i am currently in afghanistan. the second object was witnessed by many people who were in the area and curious about what i was looking up at. i work in close proximity to a flight line and this object was not a conventional commercial or military aircraft in any way.
content.summary: Two star like metalic objects sighted in broad daylight with many eye witnesses.
